1001.Name: Solsticera
1001.PoolDesc:
In this Wish event:
The base probability of obtaining an [SSR] is 0.15%, with a total probability (including guarantee) of 1.54%. You are guaranteed to obtain an [SSR] for a maximum of 80 wishes. When obtaining an [SSR], you will receive: Solsticera Gift Box.

The base probability of obtaining a [SR] is 1.85%, with a total probability (including guarantee) of 3.68%. You are guaranteed to obtain a [SR] or higher-quality item for a maximum of 30 wishes. When you obtain a [SR] or higher-quality item through guarantee, there is a 99.85% chance it will be a [SR] and a 0.15% chance it will be an [SSR]. When obtaining a [SR], you will randomly receive one of the following items according to the corresponding probabilities:
Meowlux Premium Card 60.00%
Sleepy Kitty - Headwear 10.00%
Sleepy Puppy - Headwear 10.00%
Nappo Swim Ring - Backwear 10.00%
Ee-chan Swim Ring - Backwear 10.00%
※ [SSR] and [SR] items obtained via unbound Meowlux Wish Coins can be sold at the Trading Center. Once this event is over, there will be no other way to obtain the Appearance items in this Wish event.
※The current event is "Fashion Wish." During this event, accumulated Wish counts for unacquired [SSR] and [SR] (or higher quality items) will not be reset when this event updates. These counts are calculated independently from other Wish events and do not affect each other.

The base probability of obtaining an [R] is 12.00%. When obtaining an [R], you will randomly receive one of the following items according to the corresponding probabilities:
Long Vacation - Top 1.73%
Long Vacation - Bottom 1.73%
Fine Weather - Top 1.73%

Meowlux Vault Card Box 11.53%

3003.PoolDesc:
In this Battle Will Wish:
The base probability of obtaining a [SSR] is 0.15%, with an omnipotent probability (including guarantee) of 1.35%. You are guaranteed to obtain a [SSR] for a maximum of 80 wishes. When obtaining a [SSR], you will randomly receive one of the following items with equal probability:
Will - Airona
Will - Tina
Will - Olvera
Will - Tatta
※When obtaining an [SSR], if player has already resonated with a Battle Will from the pool, the probability of obtaining this Will is 100%.
※The current event is "Battle Will Wish." During this event, accumulated Wish counts for unclaimed [SSR] and [SR] (or higher quality items) will continue to carry over within the "Battle Will Wish" event. These counts are calculated independently from other Wish events and do not affect each other.

The base probability of obtaining an [SR] is 1.20%, with a total probability (including guarantee) of 4.75%. You are guaranteed to obtain an [SR] or higher-quality item for a maximum of 20 wishes. When you obtain an [SR] or higher-quality item through guarantee, there is a 99.85% chance it will be an [SR] and a 0.15% chance it will be a [SSR]. When obtaining an [SR], you will randomly receive one of the following items with equal probability:
Will - Golden Juggernaut
Will - Frost Ogre
Will - Inferno Ogre
Will - Phantom Arachnocrab
Will - Brigand Captain
Will - Venobzzar Incubator
Will - Muku Chief
Will - Iron Fang
Will - Goblin King
Will - Tempest Ogre
Will - Celestial Flier
Will - Lizardman King
Will - Goblin King
Will - Muku King
Will - Celestial Flier

The base acquisition rate for [R] is established at 12.00%. When obtaining a [R], you will randomly receive one of the following items with the corresponding probabilities:
Will - Boarrier Tyrant
Will - Goblin Guard
Will - Goblin Warrior
Will - Goblin Mage
Will - Mighty Colossus
Will - Void Arachnocrab
Will - Brigand Scout Leader
Will - Brigand Guard Captain
Will - Void Bzzar
Will - Muku Warrior
Will - Muku Vanguard
Will - Great Warhog
Will - Storm Goblin Warrior
Will - Dark Mist Captain
Will - Dark Mist Commander
Will - Lizardman Hunter
Will - Lizardman Mage
Will - Jungle Goblin Warrior
Will - Muku Scout

The base acquisition rate for [N] is established at 86.65%. When obtaining an [N], you will randomly receive one of the following items with the corresponding probabilities:
Stunt Will - Fragment*10 9.09%
Stunt Will - Fragment*5 18.18%
Stunt Will - Fragment*2 27.27%
Stunt Will - Fragment*1 45.46%
